source_sentence: 稽首諸佛　　願護神威　　當陳誠請　罔或尤譏　　沈晦未寤　　圓覺所歸　久淪愛海　　舟檝攸希　　異執乖競　和合是依　　玄離取有　　理絕過違　慢乖八正　　戲入百非　　同捨異辯　染淨混微　　簡金去礫　　琢玉除羈　能仁普鑒　　疑慮研機　　契成大道　敦敢毀誹　　諤諤崇德　　唯唯侵衰　惟願留聽　　慶有發揮　　望矜悃悃　垂誨慈悲　　採集聖教　　纂要承暉　十周方成　　三業勞疲　　冀傳末代　聞略知機　　八邪息諍　　四句殄非　祛惑存信　　熏成智微　　含生同感　願各轉依法苑珠林卷第一百
translation: "I bow to the buddhas, wishing to protect their spiritual authority. I will present my sincere request, but I'm afraid I've been sunken into an ocean of craving for a long time, and I've sailed far away from the distinctions and contradictions, and I'm relying on what's harmonious, what's profound, free from the grasping of existence, what's false, what's prudent, and what's playful, entering into a hundred negations. I will explain the differences between defilement and purity, explain the gold away from the gravel, cut away the jade, and remove the chains. I will dare to denigrate the slander, examine the doubts, and examine the abilities of those who have attained the great way.
